00036 #include "RandomDirectionVertexBasedDivisionRule.hpp"
00037 
00038 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00039 c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM> RandomDirectionVertexBasedDivisionRule<SPACE_DIM>::CalculateCellDivisionVector(
00040     CellPtr pParentCell,
00041     VertexBasedCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>& rCellPopulation)
00042 {
00043     c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM> random_vector;
00044     double random_angle = 2.0*M_PI*RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->ranf();
00045     random_vector(0) = cos(random_angle);
00046     random_vector(1) = sin(random_angle);
00047     return random_vector;
00048 }
00049 
00050 // Explicit instantiation
00051 template class RandomDirectionVertexBasedDivisionRule<1>;
00052 template class RandomDirectionVertexBasedDivisionRule<2>;
00053 template class RandomDirectionVertexBasedDivisionRule<3>;
00054 
00055 // Serialization for Boost >= 1.36
00056 #include "SerializationExportWrapperForCpp.hpp"
00057 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS_SAME_DIMS(RandomDirectionVertexBasedDivisionRule)
